titleStmt.title: Short questions and answeres to be learned of such as be ignorant, before they be admitted to the Lords Supper. Whereunto are added certaine obseruations necessarie to be vsed of euerie Christian. / By Giles Whiting..
titleStmt.author: Whiting, Giles.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Orwin, for Robert Dexter,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, print bleeding and show-through, with considerable loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
